sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog v-model="dialog" max-width="600px">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>{{ dialogTitle }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>
          <v-form ref="form">
            <v-text-field v-model="internalEditedItem.num" :rules="rules.counter" label="№ Заявки" required></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="internalEditedItem.stg" :rules="rules.stgCheck" label="Продукт" required></v-text-field>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
                <v-menu v-model="menu2" :close-on-content-click="false" :nudge-right="40" transition="scale-transition" offset-y min-width="auto">
                  <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                    <v-text-field v-model="internalEditedItem.dadd" label="Дата" prepend-icon="mdi-calendar" readonly v-bind="attrs" v-on="on"></v-text-field>
                  </template>
                  <v-date-picker v-model="internalEditedItem.dadd" @input="menu2 = false"></v-date-picker>
                </v-menu>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-text-field v-model="internalEditedItem.client_name" :rules="rules.client_nameCheck" label="Клиент" required></v-text-field>
            <v-row>
              <v-col class="d-flex" cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-select v-model="internalEditedItem.state" :items="statusOptions" label="Статус"></v-select>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-text-field v-model="internalEditedItem.person_phone" :rules="rules.personPhoneCheck" label="Телефон" required></v-text-field>
          </v-form>
        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="closeDialog">Отмена</v-btn>
          <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="saveItem">Сохранить</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </template>

<script>

export default {
    props: {
        dialog: Boolean,
        dialogTitle: String,
        editedItem: Object,
        rules: Object
    },
    data() {
        return {
            menu2: false,
            internalEditedItem: {}
        };
    },
    watch: {
        editedItem: {
            handler(newValue) {
                this.internalEditedItem = { ...newValue };
            },
            immediate: true
        }
    },
    methods: {
        closeDialog() {
            this.$emit('close-dialog');
        },
        saveItem() {
            if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
                this.$emit('save-item', this.internalEditedItem);
            }
        }
    }
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
